Was (s)he aged 5 to 14 years at death?
Threshold: (ageInYears >= 5 && ageInYears <=14) || (age_group ==  'child' && age_child_unit == 'days' && age_child_days >= 5*365.25 && age_child_days <= 11*365.25) || (age_group ==  'child' && age_child_unit == 'months' && age_child_months >= 5*12 && age_child_months <= 11*12) || (age_group ==  'child' && age_child_unit == 'years' && age_child_years >= 5 && age_child_years <= 11) || (age_group ==  'adult' && age_adult > 11 && age_adult <= 14)

InterVA4 Question: Was (s)he aged 1 to 4 years at death?
Threshold: (ageInYears >= 1 && ageInYears <=4) || (age_group ==  'child' && age_child_unit == 'days' && age_child_days >= 1*365.25 && age_child_days <= 4*365.25) || (age_group ==  'child' && age_child_unit == 'months' && age_child_months >= 1*12 && age_child_months <= 4*12) || (age_group ==  'child' && age_child_unit == 'years' && age_child_years >= 1 && age_child_years <= 4)

InterVA4 Question: Was (s)he aged 1 to 11 months at death?
Threshold: (ageInDays >= 30.4 && ageInDays <= 12*30.4) || (age_group ==  'child' && age_child_unit == 'days' && age_child_days >= 30.4 && age_child_days <= 12*30.4) || (age_group ==  'child' && age_child_unit == 'months' && age_child_months >= 1 && age_child_months <= 12) || (age_group ==  'child' && age_child_unit == 'years' && age_child_years == 1)
